name: Blub's Tale
description:
Story:

Blub is your average lovable oaf, he may not be able to do much but he can swim.  Together you must escape the caverns deep underwater. 

Gameplay:

Swim throughout the cavern, this game was designed with phones in mind so all control is done with the buttons on screen 

Enemies:

Puff: Cute but Stupid

Sandy: Cute but Vicious

Miney: Not Cute, Not Smart, Not Vicious, Nothing at all Really, It's a mine

Additional Notes:

This is my first project, it kinda sucks but I am quite happy with how it turned out overall. Everyone's gotta start somewhere and this is only the beginning. 

 I hope you all enjoy : )
